messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm not even gone for 1 minute and the station looks like normandy after -Day.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Anti Furry Station. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You know what that announcements means? yeah teh station got flooded by syndicate shock troops so better hide

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Warehouse.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Anti Furry Station, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Anti Furry Station, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
